sentence: On February 10, House Democratic Party Minority Leader Hakeem  Jeffries formally established the Rapid Response Task Force and  Litigation Working Group, chaired by assistant leader   Joe Neguse and  co-chaired by Representatives Rosa DeLauro, Gerry Connolly, and Jamie  Raskin.
